titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C08e

sourceDesc.p: Produced from collation output prepared in batch file processing on 2018-10-04 16:58:37.992715 .
Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2019-03-15T13:32:34.575-04:00.

body.ab: <milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0022__main__1"/> I threw myself into the chaise <lb n="c56-0022__main__2"/> that was to convey me away and in<lb n="c56-0022__main__3"/>dulged in the most melancholy reflec<lb n="c56-0022__main__4"/>tions. I who had ever been surrounded <lb n="c56-0022__main__5"/> by amiable companions, continually <lb n="c56-0022__main__6"/> engaged in <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0022__main__d2e4337"/>ed<del eID="c56-0022__main__d2e4337"/> endeavouring to give <lb n="c56-0022__main__7"/> mutual pleasure; I was now alone. <lb n="c56-0022__main__8"/> In the university <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0022__main__d2e4344"/>wi<del eID="c56-0022__main__d2e4344"/> whither I was <lb n="c56-0022__main__9"/> going I must form my own friends <lb n="c56-0022__main__10"/> and be my own <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0022__main__d2e4354"/>introduction<del eID="c56-0022__main__d2e4354"/><mdel>.</mdel>protector. My <lb n="c56-0022__main__11"/> life had hitherto been remarkably retired <lb n="c56-0022__main__12"/> and domestic and this had given me <lb n="c56-0022__main__13"/> an invincible repugnance to new <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0022__main__d2e4370"/>faces<del eID="c56-0022__main__d2e4370"/><lb n="c56-0022__main__14"/> countenances. I loved my brothers Eliza<lb n="c56-0022__main__15"/>beth and Clerval these were "old <lb n="c56-0022__main__16"/> familiar faces" but I believed my<lb n="c56-0022__main__17"/>self totally unfitted for the compa<lb n="c56-0022__main__18"/>ny of strangers. Such were my reflec<lb n="c56-0022__main__19"/>tions as I commenced my journey But <lb n="c56-0022__main__20"/> as I proceeded my spirits and hopes <lb n="c56-0022__main__21"/> rose. I ardently desired knowledge <lb n="c56-0022__main__22"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0022__main__d2e4412"/>and I<del eID="c56-0022__main__d2e4412"/><lb n="c56-0022__left_margin__1"/>I had often when at home <lb n="c56-0022__main__23"/> thought <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0022__main__d2e4431"/>how<del eID="c56-0022__main__d2e4431"/>it hard <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0022__main__d2e4438"/>it was<del eID="c56-0022__main__d2e4438"/> to remain <lb n="c56-0022__main__24"/><lb n="c56-0022__left_margin__1"/>during my youth cooped up in one place all my <lb n="c56-0022__main__25"/> life and had longed to enter into the <lb n="c56-0022__main__26"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0022__main__d2e4465"/>worth<del eID="c56-0022__main__d2e4465"/> world and take my <del next="#c56-0022.05" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0022__main__d2e4468"/>place<del eID="c56-0022__main__d2e4468"/><lb n="c56-0022__main__27"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0022__main__d2e4474" xml:id="c56-0022.05"/>with<del eID="c56-0022__main__d2e4474"/><lb n="c56-0022__left_margin__1"/>station among other human beings. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0022__main__d2e4493"/>And<del eID="c56-0022__main__d2e4493"/><lb n="c56-0022__main__28"/> now my desires were <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0022__main__d2e4498"/>cop<del eID="c56-0022__main__d2e4498"/> complyed <lb n="c56-0022__main__29"/> with & it would <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>indeedhave<mdel>be</mdel><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0022__main__d2e4523"/>indeed<del eID="c56-0022__main__d2e4523"/> been folly to <lb n="c56-0022__main__30"/> repent.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0022__main__31"/> I had <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0022__main__d2e4539"/>plenty of<del eID="c56-0022__main__d2e4539"/>sufficient leisure for these<lb n="c56-0023__main__1"/> and many other reflections during <lb n="c56-0023__main__2"/> my journey to Ingolstadt which was <lb n="c56-0023__main__3"/> long and fatiguing – at length the <lb n="c56-0023__main__4"/> steeples of the town met my eyes. I <lb n="c56-0023__main__5"/> alighted and was conducted to my <lb n="c56-0023__main__6"/> solitary apartment to spend the <lb n="c56-0023__main__7"/> evening as I pleased.<lb n="c56-0024__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c56-0024.04" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 4<lb n="c56-0024__main__2"/> The next morning I delivered my <lb n="c56-0024__main__3"/> letters of introduction and paid a <lb n="c56-0024__main__4"/> visit to some of the principal <lb n="c56-0024__main__5"/> professors. and among others to M. <mdel>K</mdel><mdel>—</mdel><lb n="c56-0024__left_margin__1"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0024__left_margin__d2e4611"/>Krempe<del eID="c56-0024__left_margin__d2e4611"/>Krempe<lb n="c56-0024__main__6"/> Professor of <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0024__main__d2e4623"/>& Lecturer<del eID="c56-0024__main__d2e4623"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0024__main__d2e4626"/>upon<del eID="c56-0024__main__d2e4626"/> Natural <lb n="c56-0024__main__7"/> philosophy. He received me with <lb n="c56-0024__main__8"/> politeness, and asked me several <lb n="c56-0024__main__9"/> questions concerning my progress <lb n="c56-0024__main__10"/> in the <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0024__main__d2e4638"/>sciences<del eID="c56-0024__main__d2e4638"/> different branches <lb n="c56-0024__main__11"/> of science appertaining to natural <lb n="c56-0024__main__12"/> philosophy. I mentioned, it is true <lb n="c56-0024__main__13"/> with fear and trembling, the only <lb n="c56-0024__main__14"/> authors I had <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ever read upon those <lb n="c56-0024__main__15"/> subjects. The professor stared. I said <lb n="c56-0024__main__16"/> that I did not mention these<lb n="c56-0024__main__17"/> "Have you really" said<del rend="smear" sID="c56-0024__main__d2e4673"/>"<del eID="c56-0024__main__d2e4673"/> he "spent <lb n="c56-0024__main__18"/> "your time in studying such <lb n="c56-0024__main__19"/> "nonsence?" I replied in the affir<lb n="c56-0024__main__20"/>mative.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0024__main__21"/> "Every minute"– continued M. <mdel>K</mdel><mdel>—</mdel><lb n="c56-0024__left_margin__1"/>Krempe<lb n="c56-0024__main__22"/> with warmth," every instant that <lb n="c56-0024__main__23"/> "you have wasted upon those <lb n="c56-0024__main__24"/> "books is utterly and entirely lost. <lb n="c56-0024__main__25"/> "You have burdened your <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0024__main__d2e4719"/>bur<del eID="c56-0024__main__d2e4719"/><lb n="c56-0024__main__26"/> "<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0024__main__d2e4725"/>memor<del eID="c56-0024__main__d2e4725"/> memory with exploded <lb n="c56-0024__main__27"/> "systems and useless names. Good <lb n="c56-0024__main__28"/> "God <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0024__main__d2e4734"/>where must you<del eID="c56-0024__main__d2e4734"/>in what desart land have you <lb n="c56-0024__main__29"/> "lived where no one was kind <lb n="c56-0024__main__30"/> "enough to <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0024__main__d2e4746"/>enfor<del eID="c56-0024__main__d2e4746"/> inform you <lb n="c56-0024__main__31"/> "that these fancies which <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>you have<lb n="c56-0025__main__1"/> "so greedily imbibed are <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0025__main__d2e4773"/>at le<del eID="c56-0025__main__d2e4773"/> a <lb n="c56-0025__main__2"/> "thousand years old and as musty as <lb n="c56-0025__main__3"/> "<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0025__main__d2e4780"/>your<del eID="c56-0025__main__d2e4780"/> they are ancient. I little expected <lb n="c56-0025__main__4"/> "in this enlightened and scientific age <lb n="c56-0025__main__5"/> "to find a disciple of Albertus Mag<lb n="c56-0025__main__6"/>"nus and Paracelsus. My dear sir <lb n="c56-0025__main__7"/> "you must begin your studies entire<lb n="c56-0025__main__8"/>ly anew." So saying he ste<mdel>ss</mdel>pped aside, and <lb n="c56-0025__main__9"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0025__main__d2e4814"/>wh<del eID="c56-0025__main__d2e4814"/> wrote down a list of several <lb n="c56-0025__main__10"/> books <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0025__main__d2e4820"/>u<del eID="c56-0025__main__d2e4820"/> upon natural philosophy <lb n="c56-0025__main__11"/> which he desired me to procure <lb n="c56-0025__main__12"/> and dismissed me after mentioning <lb n="c56-0025__main__13"/> that <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0025__main__d2e4832"/>he intended<del eID="c56-0025__main__d2e4832"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0025__main__d2e4836"/>to commen<del eID="c56-0025__main__d2e4836"/> in <lb n="c56-0025__main__14"/> the beginning of the next week <lb n="c56-0025__main__15"/> he intended to commence a course <lb n="c56-0025__main__16"/> of lectures upon natural philosophy <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0025.01">X</metamark><lb n="c56-0025__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">X</metamark> in its general relations;<lb n="c56-0025__main__17"/> and that M. W.<mdel>—</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>aldham a fellow professor <lb n="c56-0025__main__18"/> would lecture upon chemistry <lb n="c56-0025__main__19"/> the alternate days which he missed.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0025__main__20"/> I returned home not dissapointed <lb n="c56-0025__main__21"/> for I had long considered the au<lb n="c56-0025__main__22"/>thors useless which the professor <lb n="c56-0025__main__23"/> had so strongly reprobated – but I <lb n="c56-0025__main__24"/> did not feel very much enclined <lb n="c56-0025__main__25"/> to <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0025__main__d2e4907"/>bu<del eID="c56-0025__main__d2e4907"/> study those books which at <lb n="c56-0025__main__26"/> his <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0025__main__d2e4912"/>recon<del eID="c56-0025__main__d2e4912"/> recommondation I had <lb n="c56-0025__main__27"/> procured. M. K<mdel>—</mdel>rempe was a little squat <lb n="c56-0025__main__28"/> man with a gruff voice and repul<lb n="c56-0025__main__29"/>sive countenance and the teacher <lb n="c56-0025__main__30"/> did not prepossess me in favour<lb n="c56-0026__main__1"/> of his
